testcase.classname: As a user/administrator, I should be able to create a new customer record in the system via API connection.
testcase.name: When an invalid email (an existing email) from the data is sent in the POST body (first_name, last_name, email,

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. Expected status code <422> but was <302>.

testcase.failure:
* The api user creates the base url.........................................passed * The api user sets "api/register" path parameters..........................passed * The api user prepares a POST request to send to the api register endpoint using an invalid email..passed * The api user sends a POST request and saves the response from the api register endpoint..passed * The api user verifies that the status code is 422.........................failed * The api user verifies that the message information in the response body is "The email has already been taken.".skipped
